name: Recipe: Haggis
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Haggis.

value.text: Purchase from Wolsey at Coupon Cafeteria in Fortress of Meropide

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Radish
customize.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Haggis
customize.desc: A dish with strong and distinctive flavors. Chop up the sheep offal, mix it with oatmeal, and stuff the mixture into a sheep stomach along with various seasonings and spices. When the dish is served, the stomach-bag is usually removed while the fillings are served with radish paste and mashed potatoes. This is a local specialty that Fontainians often cook as a treat for important guests.
